item.title: Get Start with WPS, and Call for an Elegant SAS IDE!
item.description: I got a trial version of WPS (the latest version 2.5.2.0 at Windows), which engine can interpret “some of the language of SAS”. I took piece of codes for testing and some passed while some popped up with errors (so currently it is only a limited version of SAS). I don’t drive into the deep part yet of what WPS can do and can’t do, but I do love the WPS way to organize projects, folders and files (including souse files):
